message: I'm feeling generous this round, Bob. Take 5 bucks and let's get this over with.
I think it's fair that we split the money fairly. I'm willing to give you 10% to accept this offer.
Okay Bob, I see you're playing hardball. Let's meet in the middle - I'll take 90, you get 10.  We can call it a day.
This is my final offer, Alice. We both know inflation is affecting the value of the money, but I'm willing to split it 85/15 to end this.  Let's be reasonable.
